name: Prototype Portal Based Puzzle Game
description:
This is a prototype puzzle game that I've been working on over the past few weeks. 

  • Right mouse button - Blue Portal
  • Left Mouse Button - Red Portal
  • E - Interact
  • R - reset level (incase it breaks)
  • Escape - Quit.

The goal is to unlock the puzzle door, so that you can go through it, to the next puzzle. There is 4 puzzles.

This is a heavy prototype and pre-alpha. There are and will be so many bugs. Please anticipate them. Abuse them, if you'd like. Just know - they do exist.

Any questions/feedback/comments/concerns - please contact Joe on twitter @fr0z3nR
